summary: Billing & Subscriptions Suite S6 Verification COMPLETE. All frontend tests passed. Demo page at /billing-demo verified with Playwright - all 4 tabs working correctly, VAT Calculator functional (7.5%), Create Invoice modal opens properly. The Billing suite is Demo-Ready v1. Uses STATIC demo data (no API calls).
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_INVOICES, DEMO_PAYMENTS, DEMO_CREDIT_NOTES arrays - appropriate for demo mode
✅ VAT Calculator correctly implements 7.5% Nigerian VAT (both exclusive and inclusive modes)
✅ All 4 tabs (Invoices, Payments, Credit Notes, Tools) work correctly
✅ Create Invoice modal opens with customer selection, line items, VAT exempt toggle
✅ Invoice cards display payment progress bars with correct percentages
✅ Credit notes display with Approve/Apply to Invoice actions based on status
✅ Aging Report shows correct buckets (Current, 1-30, 31-60, 61-90, 90+ days)
✅ Nigeria-First info banner displays all key information (NGN, 7.5% VAT, Net-30, TIN optional)

test_credentials.note: Demo page uses hardcoded Nigerian data, no authentication required for demo

seed_data_creation: Demo page uses hardcoded arrays: DEMO_INVOICES (4 invoices), DEMO_PAYMENTS (2 payments), DEMO_CREDIT_NOTES (2 credit notes), DEMO_AGING (5 buckets), DEMO_CUSTOMERS (4 customers), DEMO_PRODUCTS (6 products)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Billing & Subscriptions Suite S6 Verification COMPLETE. All features verified and working. Suite is Demo-Ready v1. Test at /billing-demo. Key verified: (1) All 4 tabs work, (2) VAT Calculator 7.5%, (3) Create Invoice modal, (4) Invoice cards with payment progress, (5) Credit notes with actions, (6) Aging report.

page_load: ✅ Header: 'Billing Demo' with 'Nigeria-first billing: NGN currency, 7.5% VAT, Net-30 terms' subtitle
invoices_tab: ✅ Status badges: PARTIALLY PAID, SENT, OVERDUE, PAID
✅ Customer names: Dangote Industries Ltd, Save the Children Nigeria, Adebayo Ogunlesi, Federal Ministry of Finance
✅ VAT Exempt label for NGO invoice
✅ Action buttons: Record Payment, Credit Note, View
payments_tab: ✅ Customer names and amounts in NGN
credit_notes_tab: ✅ Approve button for DRAFT credit note
✅ Apply to Invoice button for APPROVED credit note
tools_tab: ✅ Net Amount, VAT (7.5%), Gross Amount breakdown
✅ Aging buckets: Current, 1-30 Days, 31-60 Days, 61-90 Days, 90+ Days
create_invoice_modal: ✅ Modal opens on Create Invoice button click
✅ Line Items section with Add Item button
✅ Quantity input and unit price display
✅ Payment Terms: Net 30 with due date
nigeria_first_info_banner: ✅ VAT Exemptions: NGOs, basic food, medical, educational materials
✅ Partial Payments: Fully supported with tracking

mocked_apis_list: Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_INVOICES array (4 invoices)
Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_PAYMENTS array (2 payments)
Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_CREDIT_NOTES array (2 credit notes)
Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_AGING array (5 buckets)
Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_CUSTOMERS array (4 customers)
Demo page uses hardcoded DEMO_PRODUCTS array (6 products)
No live API calls - all data is static for demo purposes
